Body:
What base does vocabulary.com use for its hierarchy of meanings of a word? For example see http://www.vocabulary.com/dictionary/sound. Are top levels (numbered list) all homonyms?

What structure do you think is best for showing various meanings of a graph (word) in a dictionary?
Title: Hierarchy of meanings in a dictionary

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.

OwnerUser.AboutMe: A good Persian dictionary for you: [Vajje.com]: http://vajje.com
